meanings.sent1: I will unpay my debt next month.
meanings.sent2: If you unpay your bills, you may face consequences.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful man managed to unpay his rent again.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness towards others unpayed the debt of gratitude she owed.
meanings.sent5: The decision to unpay his loan haunted him for years.

meanings.sent1: The unpay bill caused confusion in the accounting department.
meanings.sent2: The unpay debt remained a burden on his shoulders.
meanings.sent3: The unpay prize for the contest was a mystery to all.
meanings.sent4: Her unpayable kindness touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The unpayable debt loomed over him like a dark cloud.
